translations: 散布谣言；煽动行为；群众煽动

sentences.sentence: So demagoguery it is and demagoguery it will be.
sentences.translation: 这是多么的煽动人心，而且将来还会更煽动人心。

sentences.sentence: Over the past year the demagoguery has got the upper hand.
sentences.translation: 在过去一年他的煽动主义占了上风。

sentences.sentence: Saying that isn’t demagoguery, it’s just pointing out the truth.
sentences.translation: 这样说并属于制造谣言，而只是指出了事实真相。
